Hi! My friend! This is the tiny blog where I share things.
Firstly, I must appreciate developers who maintain Hexo and the developer of theme inside Elmore Cheng. I can not go so far without them.

Then I shall thank my families as well as my friends offering their support all the time, which is my motivation to work. Also, I shall thank all the anonymous people I meet cause you are my inspiration to compose.

I am just a learner with great passion for IT,art and literature. PhotographyğŸ“·,readingğŸ“–,try new stuff on my ğŸ’» is all I enjoy. When it comes I write things too.

From the very beginning, I start with a wechat account where I share my work, and abandoned for some reason(thank the 80 followers,your support matters.) And now here we are, I hope to make it work sharing the realm of my soul.

I can barely contribute any codes, so I pick some of my photography and make it free through CC0 licence. Within 30 days, downloads reached 5k, which is really a delight. I am always happy that my work is needed and that somebody in the world who loves it.

My further plan is to write some practical tips or so called tutorials about computer operation and the issue I come across when I program with R and C#. I hope you may learn something from my articles.

This my way to give back.
My Pixabay account

Enjoy yourself.
Thanks againâ¤.
